enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve operations on the shortOpts and longOpts maps, which are central to the functionality of the getOption method.
The addOption methods initialize options that can be retrieved by the getOption method, providing a direct setup for testing.
The hasOption method checks for the presence of an option, which can be used to verify the output of the getOption method.
The getMatchingOptions method retrieves options based on partial matches, which can inform assertions about the getOption method's behavior.
